sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都有"平的，平坦的"之意。
means: even ： 通常指平面上的各点或一条直线的各点处在同一平面或直线上。
flat ： 指光滑平整的表面，但不一定是水平的。
level ： 强调没有高低之处，且在同一水平面，可引申指才能相等或与相邻某物平行。
smooth ： 侧重指表面十分平滑，无任何粗糙的感觉。引申作圆滑解。

word_mean: 图像平滑用MRI制作大脑功能活动时的标化方法

sentence.Network_en: The flagstones beneath their feet were worn smooth by centuries of use.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们脚下的石板路经过数百年的踩踏，磨得光溜溜的。

sentence.Network_en: Smooth the mixture with the back of a soup spoon.
sentence.Network_cn: 用汤勺的背面把混合料抹平。

sentence.Network_en: Twelve extremely good-looking, smooth young men have been picked as finalists.
sentence.Network_cn: 12名特别漂亮精明的青年男子被选为参加决赛的选手。

PerfectNetExp.abs: PS快捷键_百度百科 ... Border－（ 扩边） Smooth－（ 平滑（smooth）） Expand－（ 扩展）.
...顺序必须合乎逻辑，从一个句子到另一个句子的过渡必须流畅（smooth），这就是连贯性（coherence）。
人教版高中英语单词表(第三册上必修) - 豆丁网 ... brick n. 砖；砖块 smooth a. 光滑的；平坦的 grey a. 灰色的；灰白的.
牛津英语7A全套教案 - 豆丁网 ... rough 粗糙的 smooth 平滑的 smell 闻.

list.abs: 工业汉英词典 - 豆丁网 ... 平面锤 flatter 平流电容器； 滤波电容器 smoothing capacitor 平流电路； 滤汳电路 smoothing circuit.
平滑肌平滑肌（smooth muscle）广泛分布于血管壁和许多内脏器官，又称内脏肌。平滑肌的收缩较为缓慢和持久。
美剧常用俚语 - 豆丁网 ... small talk 寒喧，闲聊 smooth sailing 一帆风顺 snowball 滚雪球，越滚越大.
Jam_百度百科 ... Michael Jackson 迈克尔杰克逊 Smooth Criminal 犯罪高手（smooth criminal） Thats The Man 就是此人.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English smōth, probably of Germanic origin, though no cognates are known. The verb dates from Middle English

encyclopedia.content: 基本释义 adj. 1. 光滑的， 平滑的， 平坦的， 平整的， 平静的 2. 平稳的， 连续而流畅的， 不颠簸的， 不摇晃的 3.顺利的， 没有困难的， 没问题的 4. 过分殷勤的， 圆滑的， 圆通的， 八面玲珑的， 锛埞诛級礼貌的， 5. 液体混合物无结块的；混合均匀的 6. 醇和的；香醇的 7. 悦耳的；圆润的 8. 磨平的，磨光的 9. 锛堁蕴革級流利的；锛埲孙級文雅的；锛埼恼嘛級流畅的 vt. & vi. 锛埵癸級光滑, 锛埵癸級平坦; 锛埵癸級

entry.def: A smooth surface has no roughness, lumps, or holes.

example.ex: ...a rich cream that keeps skin soft and smooth.
example.tran: 能让皮肤永葆柔嫩光滑的营养霜

entry.tran: 稠度均匀的;细腻匀和的;不结块的
entry.def: A smooth liquid or mixture has been mixed well so that it has no lumps.

example.ex: Continue whisking until the mixture looks smooth and creamy...
example.tran: 一直搅拌，直至混合物变得均匀细腻。

example.ex: Blend the cornflour to a smooth paste with a little cold water.
example.tran: 加入少量的凉水，将玉米粉搅拌成均匀的糊状。

entry.tran: (葡萄酒、威士忌或咖啡等)醇和的，不烈的，不苦的
entry.def: If you describe a drink such as wine, whisky, or coffee as smooth, you mean that it is not bitter and is pleasant to drink.

example.ex: This makes the whiskeys much smoother.
example.tran: 这样一来，威士忌就醇和多了。

entry.def: A smooth line or movement has no sudden breaks or changes in direction or speed.

example.ex: This exercise is done in one smooth motion.

entry.tran: (骑马、航行等)平稳的，顺顺当当的
entry.def: A smooth ride, flight, or sea crossing is very comfortable because there are no unpleasant movements.

example.ex: The active suspension system gives the car a very smooth ride.
example.tran: 这个主动悬架系统使汽车行驶起来非常平稳。

entry.def: You use smooth to describe something that is going well and is free of problems or trouble.

example.ex: Political hopes for a swift and smooth transition to democracy have been dashed...
example.tran: 迅速而顺利地过渡到民主体制的政治希望破灭了。

example.ex: A number of problems marred the smooth running of this event.
example.tran: 一些问题搅乱了这一事件的顺利进展。

entry.tran: 故作殷勤有礼的;精明圆滑的;圆通的
entry.def: If you describe a man as smooth, you mean that he is extremely smart, confident, and polite, often in a way that you find rather unpleasant.

example.ex: Twelve extremely good-looking, smooth young men have been picked as finalists...
example.tran: 12 名特别漂亮精明的青年男子被选为参加决赛的选手。

example.ex: He was the smoothest and probably the most powerful chief of staff in political memory.
example.tran: 在人们关于政治人物的记忆里，他是最精明、可能也是最有权势的参谋长。

entry.def: If you smooth something, you move your hands over its surface to make it smooth and flat.

example.ex: She stood up and smoothed down her frock...

entry.def: If you smooth something somewhere, you use your hands to spread it there.

example.ex: She smoothed the lotion across his shoulder blades...
example.tran: 她在他的肩胛骨上抹了乳液。

example.ex: His fingers smoothed the hair back from her face.
example.tran: 他用手把她脸上的头发捋到脑后。

entry.def: If you smooth the path or smooth the way towards something, you make it easier or more likely to happen.

example.ex: Their talks were aimed at smoothing the path towards a treaty to limit long-range weapons.
example.tran: 他们的会谈旨在为缔结限制远程武器条约铺平道路。

entry.tran: 既能享乐也能吃苦;是好是歹一起承受
entry.def: If you say that someone has to take the rough with the smooth, you mean that they have to accept the unpleasant or difficult things that happen as well as the pleasant things.

sentences.sentence: "he gave his hair a quick smooth"

means.word_mean: 1. make smooth or smoother, as if by rubbing;
1. having a surface free from roughness or bumps or ridges or irregularities;
2. smoothly agreeable and courteous with a degree of sophistication;

sentences.sentence: "he was too politic to quarrel with so important a personage"
"the hostess averted a confrontation between two guests with a diplomatic change of subject"
"the manager pacified the customer with a smooth apology for the error"
"affable, suave, moderate men...smugly convinced of their respectability" - Ezra Pound

means.word_mean: 3. of the margin of a leaf shape; not broken up into teeth
6. without breaks between notes; smooth and connected;

sentences.sentence: "the bill's path through the legislature was smooth and orderly"

auth_sentence.content: Roll the mutton mixture to achieve a smooth cylinder.
auth_sentence.res_content: Roll the mutton mixture to achieve a smooth cylinder.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Roll the mutton mixture to achieve a smooth cylinder.

auth_sentence.content: Europa Jupiter's smooth moon may have subsurface oceans.
auth_sentence.res_content: Europa Jupiter's smooth moon may have subsurface oceans.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Europa Jupiter's smooth moon may have subsurface oceans.

auth_sentence.content: Is Raul Malo taking the smooth classicism too far?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is Raul Malo taking the smooth classicism too far?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is Raul Malo taking the smooth classicism too far?

means.word_mean: 光滑的, 平滑的, 平坦的, 平整的, 平静的
顺利的, 没有困难的, 没问题的

sentences.en: There is a smooth style of writing in this novel.
This agreement will smooth the way to peace.
sentences.cn: 这一协议将为和平铺平道路。

sentences.en: Speaking the language fluently certainly smoothed our path.
sentences.cn: 我们说这种语言很流利, 确实给我们带来了许多方便。

means.word_mean: 清涂…的障碍(或困难、分歧等)，消除(away， out)

sentences.cn: 他的怒火已平息下来了。

jushi.english: We are now in smooth water.
I don't trust those smooth salesmen.
jushi.chinese: 我不相信那些油嘴滑舌的推销员。

jushi.english: There is a smooth style of writing in this novel.
